description:
A fleece fit for movement, the Otero Half-Zip Pullover features a slim silhouette, a recycled polyester blend, a raised grid back for more
warmth and breathability, and concealed zippers. This technical fleece is great for cool weather hikes or other adventures.
Also available in women’s.
name: Cotopaxi Otero Fleece Half-Zip Pullover - Mens
